00037     // NGL and tidy up any shaders textures etc

00039     killTimer(m_redrawTimer);
00040     killTimer(progressTimer);
00041

00044     ngl::NGLInit *ngl = ngl::NGLInit::instance();

00046     ngl->NGLQuit();

00052 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00053 // This virtual function is called once before the first call to paintGL() or resizeGL(),
00054 //and then once whenever the widget has been assigned a new QGLContext.
00055 // This function should set up any required OpenGL context rendering flags, defining display lists, etc.
00056 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00057 void GameLogic::initializeGL()
00058 {
00059 
00060 
00061 
00062   glClearColor(0.4f, 0.4f, 0.4f, 1.0f); // Black Background
00063   // enable depth testing for drawing
00064   glEnable(GL_DEPTH_TEST);
00065   // we need to initialise the NGL lib, under windows and linux we also need to
00066   // initialise GLEW, under windows this needs to be done in the app as well
00067   // as the lib hence the WIN32 define
00068   ngl::NGLInit *Init = ngl::NGLInit::instance();
00069   Init->initGlew();    m_keysPressed.clear();
00070   #ifdef WIN32
00071     glewInit(); // need a local glew init as well as lib one for windows
00072   #endif
00073 //  // now to load the shader and set the values
00074 //  // grab an instance of shader manager
00075 
00076   ngl::ShaderLib *shader=ngl::ShaderLib::instance();
00077   // we are creating a shader called Texture
00078   shader->createShaderProgram("Texture");
00079   // now we are going to create empty shaders for Frag and Vert
00080   shader->attachShader("TextureVertex",ngl::VERTEX);
00081   shader->attachShader("TextureFragment",ngl::FRAGMENT);
00082   // attach the source
00083   shader->loadShaderSource("TextureVertex","shaders/TextureVertex.glsl");
00084   shader->loadShaderSource("TextureFragment","shaders/TextureFragment.glsl");
00085   // compile the shaders
00086   shader->compileShader("TextureVertex");
00087   shader->compileShader("TextureFragment");
00088   // add them to the program
00089   shader->attachShaderToProgram("Texture","TextureVertex");
00090   shader->attachShaderToProgram("Texture","TextureFragment");
00091 
00092   // now we have associated this data we can link the shader
00093   shader->linkProgramObject("Texture");
00094   // and make it active ready to load values
00095   (*shader)["Texture"]->use();
00096 
00097 
00098   // Now we will create a basic Camera from the graphics library
00099   // This is a static camera so it only needs to be set once
00100   // First create Values for the camera position
00101   ngl::Vec3 from_cam1(0,20,-80);//20,-80
00102   ngl::Vec3 to_cam1(0,0,0);
00103   ngl::Vec3 up_cam1(0,1,0);
00104   // now load to our new camera
00105   m_cam= new ngl::Camera(from_cam1,to_cam1,up_cam1,ngl::PERSPECTIVE);
00106   // set the shape using FOV 45 Aspect Ratio based on Width and Height
00107   // The final two are near and far clipping planes of 0.5 and 10
00108   m_cam->setShape(45,(float)1024.0/720.0,0.05,350,ngl::PERSPECTIVE);
00109 
00110   ngl::Vec3 from_cam2(30,30,-50);
00111   ngl::Vec3 to_cam2(0,0,0);
00112   ngl::Vec3 up_cam2(0,1,0);
00113   m_cam1 = new ngl::Camera(from_cam2,to_cam2,up_cam2,ngl::PERSPECTIVE);
00114   m_cam1->setShape(90,(float)1024.0/720.0,0.05,350,ngl::PERSPECTIVE);
00115   m_cam1->yaw(60);
00116   m_cam1->roll(25);
00117 
00118   ngl::Vec3 from_cam3(0,200,-10);
00119   ngl::Vec3 to_cam3(0,0,0);
00120   ngl::Vec3 up_cam3(0,1,0);
00121 
00122 
00123 
00124   m_cam2 = new ngl::Camera(from_cam3,to_cam3,up_cam3,ngl::PERSPECTIVE);
00125   m_cam2->setShape(45,(float)1024.0/720.0,0.05,350,ngl::PERSPECTIVE); // change camera value to accomodate mor viewing angle from top, may be set projection
00126 
00127 
00128   ngl::Vec3 from_cam4(-30,30,-50);
00129   ngl::Vec3 to_cam4(0,0,0);
00130   ngl::Vec3 up_cam4(0,1,0);
00131   m_cam3 = new ngl::Camera(from_cam4,to_cam4,up_cam4,ngl::PERSPECTIVE);
00132   m_cam3->setShape(90,(float)1024.0/720.0,0.05,350,ngl::PERSPECTIVE);
00133   m_cam3->yaw(-60);
00134   m_cam3->roll(-25);
00135 
00136 
00137 
00138 
00139 
00140 
00141   shader->setShaderParam3f("viewerPos",m_cam->getEye().m_x,m_cam->getEye().m_y,m_cam->getEye().m_z);
00142 
00143   drawEngine = new GameDrawEngine(1024,780);
00144   level = new GameLevel(drawEngine,physicsWorld,1024,780);
00145   level->setLevelDifficulty(difficulty);
00146   level->setLevelNumber(m_levelNumber);
00147   level->addPlayerToLevel();
00148   m_grenade = level->getPlayer();
00149   level->addObstaclesToLevel(); // change this based on difficulty
00150   level->addCrateBoxToLevel();
00151   level->addBGToLevel();
00152   drawEngine->addCamToRepos(CAM_DEFAULT,m_cam);
00153   drawEngine->addCamToRepos(CAM_LEFT,m_cam1);
00154   drawEngine->addCamToRepos(CAM_TOP,m_cam2);
00155   drawEngine->addCamToRepos(CAM_RIGHT,m_cam3);
00156   changeCamera(CAM_DEFAULT);
00157   level->addGraphicImages();
00158   level->addCollisionBoxes();
00159   gameStarted = 1;
00160 
00161 
00162 m_redrawTimer = startTimer(10);
00163 
00164 }

00183 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00184 //This virtual function is called whenever the widget needs to be painted.
00185 // this is our main drawing routine
00186 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00187 void GameLogic::paintGL()
00188 {
00189   // clear the screen and depth buffer
00190   glClear(GL_COLOR_BUFFER_BIT | GL_DEPTH_BUFFER_BIT);
00191   level->drawLevel();
00192   if(level->getLevelNumber() == LEVEL3) // jus for prototypes..change it to more appropriate switch case when more levels are developed
00193   {
00194       level->simulateAI();
00195   }
00196 
00197   if(getGameWonFlag() == true)
00198   {
00199       static int counter = 1;
00200 
00201       static int color = 1;
00202 
00203       m_text = new ngl::Text(QFont("PakTypeNaqsh",30));
00204       m_text->setColour(color,color,color);
00205       if ( counter == 50)
00206       {
00207           counter = 1;
00208           color = -color;
00209       }
00210       m_text->renderText(20,20,winningText);
00211       m_text->renderText(20,50,winningText2);
00212       counter++;
00213   }
00214 
00215   if (lostFlag == true)
00216   {
00217       static int lostColorCounter = 1;
00218 
00219       static int lostColor = 1;
00220 
00221       m_text = new ngl::Text(QFont("PakTypeNaqsh",30));
00222       m_text->setColour(lostColor,lostColor,lostColor);
00223       if ( lostColorCounter == 50)
00224       {
00225 
00226        lostColorCounter = 1;
00227        lostColor = -lostColor;
00228       }
00229 
00230      m_text->renderText(50,50,lostText);
00231 
00232      lostColorCounter++;
00233   }
00234 
00235 }

00238 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00239 // this overloaded method is called every time the timers trigger
00240 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00241 void GameLogic::timerEvent(
00242                           QTimerEvent *_event
00243                          )
00244 {
00245 
00246     if (_event->timerId() == m_redrawTimer)
00247     {
00248     physicsWorld->step();
00249     updateGL();
00250     }
00251 
00252 
00253 }

00257 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00258 // in this case this method is called from the MainWindow class and passed
00259 // the key event from that, if we didn't need to process the events in main
00260 // window we could just overload this as the keyPressEvent and only process here.
00261 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00262 void GameLogic::processKeyDown(
00263                                                              QKeyEvent *_event
00264                                                             )
00265 {
00266     switch(_event->key())
00267     {
00268         case Qt::Key_1 : changeCamera(CAM_DEFAULT);break;
00269         case Qt::Key_2 : changeCamera(CAM_LEFT);break;
00270         case Qt::Key_3 : changeCamera(CAM_TOP);break;
00271         case Qt::Key_4 : changeCamera(CAM_RIGHT);break;
00272     case Qt::Key_Left:
00273     {
00274         level->setArrowDrawFlag(1);
00275         level->accumulateDirection(10);
00276         break;
00277     }
00278     case Qt::Key_Right:
00279     {
00280         level->setArrowDrawFlag(1);
00281         level->accumulateDirection(-10);
00282         break;
00283     }
00284 
00285     case Qt::Key_Up:
00286     {
00287 
00288 
00289         level->accumulateAcceleration(10);
00290         //moveGrenade();
00291         break;
00292     }
00293 
00294     case Qt::Key_Down:
00295     {
00296 
00297 
00298         level->accumulateAcceleration(-10);
00299         //moveGrenade();
00300         break;
00301     }
00302 
00303     case Qt::Key_Space:
00304     {
00305         level->setArrowDrawFlag(0);
00306         level->accumulateDirection(0);
00307         if (_event->isAutoRepeat() == 1)
00308         {
00309             break;
00310         }
00311         if (level->getLevelNumber() >= 2)
00312         {
00313         level->moveGrenade(windValue);
00314         }
00315         else
00316         {
00317            level->moveGrenade();
00318         }
00319         level->accumulateAcceleration(0);
00320 
00321         break;
00322     }
00323         default:break;
00324     }
00325 
00326     if ((_event->key() != Qt::Key_1) || (_event->key() != Qt::Key_2) )
00327     {
00328         // add to our keypress set the values of any keys pressed
00329         m_keysPressed += (Qt::Key)_event->key();
00330     }
00331 
00332 }
00333

00335 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00336 // in this case this method is called from the MainWindow class and passed
00337 // the key event from that, if we didn't need to process the events in main
00338 // window we could just overload this as the keyPressEvent and only process here.
00339 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00340 void GameLogic::processKeyUp(
00341                                                              QKeyEvent *_event
00342                                                             )
00343 {
00344     // remove from our key set any keys that have been released
00345     m_keysPressed -= (Qt::Key)_event->key();
00346 }
